Reviews.Content: recommended hotel time family friends time lived london ties ties university stay town stay satisfactory family suite 2 adults children private bath served proper english breakfast hit kids clean staff friendly location handy tube nice market nearby

Reviews.Title: “Not disappointed”

Reviews.Content: booked near british library found location euston road etc blocks busy transportation soon streets relative quiet pubs restaurants grocery stores quirky shops nice little shopping centre blocks russell tube stop stairs steep shower sink bathroom hall bathroom shower hall owner friendly helpful breakfast staff organized walking distance british museum

Reviews.Title: “Not What We Expected”
Reviews.Author: DIG1991
Reviews.Content: stayed november following 4 description website guest house modernisation lifts prepared haul narrow staircase ground floor whilst clean ensuite shower disappointing dated heater poor ventilation creaky floorboards adjoining aid sleep breakfast served basement ok bacon andor sausage successive days freshly prepared tea bags premium location equidistant pancras russell square tube access local shops pubs museums british museum british library etc

Reviews.Title: “Charmingly good value”
Reviews.Author: Planningmyhols
Reviews.Content: stayed overnight theatre trip 7 ground floor size charmingly furnished clean tiny shower loo sliding door doesnt close trust person youre reasonably clean nice touch free computer lovely sitting breakfast served basement nice location london crescent gardens tennis courts opposite value london hotel location 10 mins walk euston

Reviews.Title: “very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: gepang
Reviews.Content: stayed crescent hotel double ensuite bathroom hotel conveniently located arrived kings cross underground minutes reach hotel located gardens floor lift clean confortable bed bathroom breakfast served english breakfast cooked continental breakfast buffet wait minutes table underground stop russel square 45 minute walk definitly choice london

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: LyndsayF
Reviews.Content: london hotels incredibly expensive money doesnt hotel represents value money central location safe night neighbourhood breakfast coffee excellent clean wooden floors downside horrid damp smell basement corridor fortunately smell actual fire alarm 430am night staff informed activated ardent nonsmoker evidence actual smoke fire found little disconcerting fire alarm simply hour found difficult sleep consequently miss hours course following day electrical faults happen nice apologise guests including checkout didnt happen slightly cold radiator hadnt bled staff little friendly arriving hotel 2am due horrendously delayed train journey found housekeeper gruff actually found apologising inconveniencing technically guests hotels entitled check whenever wish nice acknowledged delay ok feel apologize value stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in a good location”
Reviews.Author: cky2011
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 5 nights hotel located safe locality russell sq euston underground stations convenient allows flexibility planning tube trips bathroom clean comfortable albeit bit breakfast variety food staff friendly free internet access computer front wifi reasonable rates luggage left office check fortunately 1st floor otherwise lugging luggage floors challenge lift pleasant experience

Reviews.Title: “Clean and nice”
Reviews.Author: lwright_16
Reviews.Content: stayed six nights september 2011 clean bit comfortable staff helpful lot questions breakfast filling definitely recommend nice quiet tour london locale british museum tube train stations

Reviews.Title: “A Little Gem”
Reviews.Author: bry244
Reviews.Content: travelled 2 11yr olds staying family am careful booking hotel check trip advisor beforehand glad location 10mins walk kings warm welcome able leave bags 10am secure saved â£8 bag left luggage kings clean quiet fabulous breakfast staff told lot regulars add thier growing list

Reviews.Title: “Everything you need”
Reviews.Author: PalettePalatePlate
Reviews.Content: weekend london busting budget clean sink towels teacoffee desk tv 3 channels floorboards creak hear neighbor shouldnt scare hope elected share toiletshower id spend money id save london somethings wait shower spotless breakfast solid start breakfast porridge cereals available perfectly pleasant luxury feeling special bit london glam isnt looking clean welllocated pleasant sleep exploring london ideal

Reviews.Title: “Good location but...”
Reviews.Author: TravelistaCA
Reviews.Content: recently stayed crescent friend recommended location found hotel somewhat lacking tired looking beds hard uncomfortable tv reception nonexistant watch little tv vacation able watch news nice staff rude nor friendly doubted cared return visit

Reviews.Content: 4th time stayed crescent hotel time clean breakfast staff friendly convenient location walk euston station kings crossst pancras russell square tube stations 510 min easy picadilly line heathrow original review oct 2008 applies except mold shower curtain time arrived heathrow late didnt hotel midnight 1am reception closed rang bell outside staff 23 minutes perfectly friendly feel putting arriving late stayed 3 times daughter aged 1012 safe times prices reasonable computer lounge internet access free frequently occupied able people dont stay pay wifi 6 10 â£ stay cant remember exactly change code sundays code sunday

Reviews.Title: “Terrific value, accommodating staff, comfortable rooms.”
Reviews.Author: Schuylkill
Reviews.Content: ive stayed bed breakfast 40 times 1980s family run generation owners comfortable modern amenities wi fi phone telly crescent reasonably priced includes english breakfast meet people world location superb near euston st pancras stations russell square underground walking distance british library british museum west nearby buses run south bank corner laundromat scores nearby restaurants superb establishment
